MUSTAPHA ABACHA (to Lewd)


Monday, May 16, 2005

Dear Brother,

I have not head from you, what happone i hope you are fine. well i just want to know if you are okay. i have send to you what my mother Hajia Mariam Abacha, ask me to do. please my Brother for the safety of this transaction. i advice you to get a new phone for our comminication. because i do not want any thing to declien this transaction as you have said that you don't want your partner to know about this. so get a new phone and get back to me as soon as you receive this message. i have made all the neccesary arrangement on how you will receive the fund from the security company.

I also want totalk with you on the phone. you can reach me on this number +234-80-33620321 for more advice. i am very happy to have you as my partner in bisuness. as i know that after this transaction is concluded you will smile. 

I am waiting,
Alhaji Mustapha Abacha.

messages.subject: CONFIDENTIAL
messages.body:
<istlady_mariamabacha@yahoo.com>
Monday, May 9, 2005

ABACHA's VILLA,#26, 
ABUBAKAR RIMI, WAY,OFF MNAMDI AZIKIWE ROAD,
KANO, KANO STATE.

ATT:THE /C.E.O
Dear Friend,

Compliments of the season.I did like to send to you the best wishes of good health and success in your pursuits particularly through my proposal as contained in this letter. i may not wish to disclose how I got your email address for now. After due deliberation with my son, I decided to forward to you this business proposal, we want you to assist us .I will give you more information. As to this regard as soon as you reply.

I am Mrs. Mariam Abacha,the widow of the late Gen.Sani Abacha former NigerianMilitary Head of State who died mysteriously as a result of Cardiac Arrest. Since after my husband's death my family is under restriction of movement and that not with standing,we are being molested,policed and our Bank Account both here and abroad are being frozen by the Nigerian Civilian Government.Further more, my elder son have been in detention in the last four years following the death of my late husband for charges of State organized murder and corrupt practices. he was just been released by the Supreme Court after the president brokered a deal with my family regarding his freedom. and he is still under interrogation about my late husband's assets and some vital documents.

Following the recent discovery of my husband's Bank Account by the Nigerian Government with Swiss Bank in which the huge sum of US$53 Million recovered. I therefore decided to contact you in confidence that I was able to move out the sum of US$7.3m Dollars, sealed in Metal Boxes for security reasons. I therefore personally appeal to you seriously and religiously for your urgent assistance to move this money in to your country where I believe it will be safe since I cannot leave the country due to the restriction of movement imposed on the members of my family by the Nigerian Government.

I am seriously considering to settle down abroad in a friendly atmosphere like yours as soon as this fund get into your account so that I can start all over again if only you wish, please do not let me out to the security as I am giving you this information in total trust and confidence. I believe you know that the only thing we need from each other is TRUST and to see that it remains confidential. hence my approach to you due to security network placed on my day to day affairs I cannot afford to visit the embassy so that is why I decided to contact you. You can contact me through my email address as above and I shall ask my son MUSTAPHA to come over to your country to liaise with you towards effective completion of this transaction.

If this proposal satisfies you, please send to me the following important information. immediately your contact address Your full names, mailing address, PersonalPhone / Fax Numbers for easy communication. to my secured email account:mariamabacha_2006@mail.com

This transaction will last for 14 working days from the time we submit the required information, as all modalities concerning this transaction have been worked out and it is completely risk free.Please be informed that this subject is classified sensitive.Therefore treat the transaction with utmost confidentiality and urgency. However,as soon as you indicate your interest my son shall send you the related documents so that you can help to claim the Luggage and subsequently transfer to your personal or company's account.

Conclusively,we have agreed to offer you 30% of the total sum,10% will be for expenses incurred during thecause of thi stransaction, while 60% is to be held on trust by you until we can decide on a suitable business investment in your country subsequent to our free movement by the Nigerian Government. Please reply urgently and treat with absolute confidentiality and sincerity. 

Best Regards,
HAJIA MARIAM ABACHA

NOTE:WHY I CONTACTED YOU NOW IS THE CURRENT APPEAL BY OUR PRESIDENT CHIEF OLUSOGUN OBASUNJO TO THE WORLD LEADERS ON THE UNITED NATION ORGANISATION MEETING IN NEW YORK CITY (USA)TO ASSIST IN RETURING MY HUSBAND FUND IN FOREIGN ACCOUNTS.

please kindly reply to my mail ok.may the almighty allah bless you,
MARIAM ABACHA

messages.body:
Mrs. Abacha,
Your proposal sounds very reasonable and I would be pleased to help you move your money here.

I must say you have two very beautiful daughters! May I ask what their names are? Are they married? Will they be coming here with you? Maybe they could come with or instead of Mustapha?

Regarding the information you asked for: My name is Lewis D. Noogie and I work as an international hotel consultant. I am from Kiev, Georgia, but I am currently consulting to a hotel here in Novosibirsk, Latvia. My mailing address is c/o Hotel Bolshoi Huisos, 12 Otyebis Blvd., Kiev, Georgia.

I expect to be at my present location for about three more weeks. I guess if you need to contact me by phone you could use the one here at the hotel.7-095-924-50-26. Just tell the switchboard operator that you're looking for me and they can locate me anyplace here in the hotel.

How and when will the Metal Boxes arrive here?

By the way, my friends call me Lewd (short for Lewis D.)

Lewd

messages.subject: THANK YOU.
messages.body:
Saturday, May 14, 2005

Dear Lewis,

I got your mail, and content was well understood. I instructed my son Mustapha to put you on the phone. so that you and i will have a vioce contact. but the telephone number you gave to me was not responding. at that time was praying. i have been able to consult my consultance and i was told that you are a good person. that you will not run away with my money.I am very happy that you have responded regarding the way forward to this transaction. yes i accept your offer because i want this transaction to be completed as soon as possible. 

my dear Lewis i dont longer see you as a friend or someone i have not seen face to face. but i see you as my son that i can trust. i believe in God and i know my God will not let me down. i repose great confidence in you. and i hope you will not betray my confidence in you. As soon as you receive this message. send me all the needed details for easy comminication. also call me on my direct line +234-80-33620321 for more details, once i receive those information needed from you, i will instruct my son to give you the contact of my family lawyer. who is in charge of the documents that will enable you lay claim to the fund. call me to reasure me your rediness to meet with the security company as we give you all the information you will be needed. i will be expecting your possitive reply soon

Thank you
Hajia Mariam. 

NOTE: THAT I NEED TO KNOW YOUR AGE.SO THAT I WILL KNOW IF YOU ARE CAPABLE OF HANDLING THIS TRANSACTION.

messages.body:
Mariam,
It is a very touching thing to know that you consider me as a son. I was orphaned at he age of 33 and terribly miss the relationship of a mother. I also can't wait to meet my sisters! I expect some touching to be involved there as well!

To answer your question about my age, I am 39. I am a successful businessman and I am fully confident I can help you with this transaction.

I should explain my current situation to you. I am an international hotel consultant, currently consulting to a small resort hotel here in Novosibirsk, Latvia. I have a signed agreement with my partners that I will not engage in any kind of financial activity outside of the partnership. For this reason I must insist on strict confidentiality for the duration of this transaction. I cannot overstress that my partners must never know about our activity. I am also not allowed to make personal calls out using the hotel phones and I don't own a cell phone. I will inquire as to the possibilities of obtaining one and will let you know.

I don't understand what you mean when you say the telephone number I gave you is not responding. It's the hotel switchboard and it should be manned 24 hours a day. I have to thank you for this information because this is exactly the kind of problem they called me in to fix here.

Have Mustapha try again or tell him to send me an email with instructions as to what I should do.

Lewd

LEWD (to "Fake" Mariam)

messages.body:
Mom (I hope you don't mind if I call you that),

I'm terribly sorry that I didn't get back to you sooner. I was called away to another hotel in Tblisi, Czechoslovakia on an emergency and did not get back to Novosibirsk until late last night.

I have a mountain of work to catch up on but will try to write again later today or first thing tomorrow. I did hear from brother Mustapha and will also try to get back to him as well.

Lewd

messages.subject: HAVE NOT HEARD FROM YOU...?
messages.body:
<mariamaba1@excite.com>
Friday, May 20, 2005 

From Mariam Abacha 

Dear Friend, 

I got your contacts through my personal research, and out of desperation I decided to reach you through this medium. I will give you more information. 

As to this regard as soon as you reply. I repose great confidence in you hence my approach to you due to security network placed on my day to day affairs, I cannot afford to visit the embassy so that is why I decided to contact you and I hope you will not betray my confidence in you. I have deposited the sum of $30million dollar in a swift security firm, whose name is withheld for now until we open communication. So please send down your phone/Fax Number and your contact address. I shall be grateful if you could receive this fund into your account for safe keeping in your country.I have gotten a diplomat who will move this money to you in your country and he is going to give you a call when he gets there so that you can meet with him and collect the money from him and keep it for me till my son come over for the sharing. 

This arrangement is known to you and my son Mallam Mohammed Abacha alone,who shall be in full charge of the transaction as I am being placed on security surveillance for now. He shall give you the details of the transaction.It accrue you 30% of this fund. 

Please honesty is the watch word in this transaction, I will greatly appreciate if you accept my proposal in good faith. 

Please expedite action. 

Sincerely yours, 
Mariam Abacha
messages.raw:
[Hmmm. Mariam (Mom) sends me another initial letter but this time the amount is down from $53 million to $30 million, and her son Mallam Mohammed will be my point of contact instead of son Mustapha. Mallam Mohammed is now the eldest son while Mustapha has become the youngest. Curious, some of these Nigerian customs....]

"REAL" MARIAM ABACHA (to Lewd)

messages.subject: THANKS SO MUCH..
messages.body:
<mariamaba3@kaixo.com> 
Friday, May 20, 2005

My Dear Lewis,

I have three grown up son, Mustapha, Mallam Abba and Mallam Mohammed.
Mustapha (youngest) is not available at the moment, he is running his masters programme in Ghana .

And he complained initially that he did not hear from you and he suspected that someone was having access to his mail box. Please do not reply to any mail from that box as it appears that it is no longer save for the transaction.

My second son Mallam Abba is on a mission to Swizerland to solve issues on our family accounts that were froozen by the Swiss Authority on the instruction of the president of Nigeria.

Hence, I have decided that my eldest son; Mallam Mohammed Abacha deals with you directly.

We have gotten the assistance of a diplomat who will bring the consignment to you in your country. That is the reason of contacting you again to be very sure that I am still dealing with you.

You can reach my son on his email via: mallammohammed_aba@yahoo.com
He will give you details of the transaction and what to do to make the venture a successful one.

Please contact him now, I have already discussed with him. 
You can always get to me when you need my attention in any way.

Thanks
HAJIA MARIAM ABACHA

messages.subject: DETAILS OF MY MUM'S PROPOSAL TO YOU
messages.body:
Saturday, May 21, 2005

Dear Friend,

How are you today, Hope you are fine? I hereby acknowledge the receipt of the mail you sent to my mum. We have agreed to proceed to execute this business with you, as it appears that you are the God sent person to deliver us from the hands of our countrymen and our enemies. We are serious people that have been pushed to the extreme end of the wall.

You must understand that it is frustrations and betrayals from my people and those very close to my family that has made us thrown caution to the wind and trust you that we have never met all our live, but as the saying goes, "When there is no venture, there can be no success".

My mum called me to inform me of your response to her mail and your willingness to assist us. She has instructed me to deal directly with you in this transaction. This is as a result of the security surveillance placed upon her by the Government of Rtd.General Olusegun Obasanjo.

So sorry for the late reply

We have got the assistance of a Diplomat who has agreed to help us in moving the consignment to you in your country. This is why we have contacted you to help take custody of the consignment containing the funds (US$30m) your share of the money is US$9 million why we are getting US$21m. The diplomat will be moving with the consignment early next week. The Diplomat shall give you a call immediately he gets to your country to discuss with you on how to locate you. 

Send me your full names, contact address, confidential telephone number so that I can give them to him. I will come over to join you up for the sharing/investment.

Please send to me more information about yourself to enable me get to know you better. It is important that you call me on my telephone number as above as soon as you receive this message so that I can instruct you on how to proceed and also give you further information that you may require. Be assured that this is 100% risk free and success guaranteed. I will very much like to know more about you, like your age, your occupation, your contact address etc. 

At this juncture, we should introduce a code word, which we shall be using in all our correspondence verbal or in writing.

If you call me, ask me of my pet name, I will answer "IMAM" If I do not give you the correct answer, please do not speak with me, hang up the phone, if I call you, I will also ask you, what is your pet name?" then you must answer, "IMAM". This is very important for security reasons and for the security of the funds till it gets to your hand.
My mum extent her heartfelt gratitude to you and your members of your family. 

May almighty God crown our endeavor with success. 

Truly Yours, 
Mallam Mohammed Abacha

messages.body:
Brother Mallam,
It's good to finally meet you. Your mother has told me a little bit about you. I was expecting to be working with Mustapha but either of you is good.

I explained to your mother my situation here regarding phones. I am an international hotel consultant, currently consulting to a hotel here in Novosibirsk, Latvia. I can receive calls here at the hotel (7-095-924-50-26) but am not allowed to make personal calls out. Not to worry though, I have found there is very little in the way of business that cannot be conducted via email. Just amazing how far computers have come in the past 10 years, isn't it?

You can pass on the following information to the diplomat:

Full Name: 
Lewis D. Noogie

Contact Address: 
c/o Zayebis Hotel
203 Pizdyets Ulitsa
Novosibirsk, Latvia
Tel: 7-095-924-50-26

When should I expect the arrival of the diplomat?

Mallam, tell me about your sisters. Your mother sent me their pictures but she didn't really tell me anything, like how old they are, if they are married, etc. Will they be coming with you when you come here? Do they have email addresses of their own? Your mother told me that she considers me as a son which would make you my brother and them my sisters, so naturally I want to know more about them.

I'll await your next letter.
Lewd

messages.body:
Saturday, May 21, 2005

Dear Friend, 

I received your mail to me.I am so glad that you responded immediately. You have asked so many interesting questions about my family.I will give a brief answer to you.I am the eldest son of my family.About my sisters; Aishat is married but Zainab not yet. 

I will discuss with you in details when I come over to your country. You have to make arrangement for us to buy a 4-bed-room bungalow in a decent location close to the beach. 

I will be coming immediately you receive the consignment in your country.After then my mum. 

I have discussed with the Diplomat who will bring the consignment containing the funds to you in your country. He will leave next week by tuesday and he will give you a call immediately he gets there.

I will give him your contact address, or he will call you immediately he arrives your country so that you pick him up from the airport . 

There is one thing I want you to do. I want you to hire a lawyer in Nigeria who will represent you in signing an agreement which three of us will have to sign before he lives. His name is Barrister Rasheed Rafindadi Clark and his email address is barristerclark_law@yahoo.com

Send him a mail and ask him to represent you in the endorsement of the agreement since it will not be convenient for you to come down to Nigeria to sign it.The Attorney will have to ask for a pay for his services but it will be something you can afford. Just try and get in touch with him. It is very important for the safety and security of the transaction. 

I would have like to talk with you on phone, but it seems your line is not safe for our discussions. 

I am sure that my mum must have told you that Mustapha no longer use that mail address, he suspected that someone else is having access to it. Please take note and do not reply or send any mail to that box from now upward. 

I await your response.Thanks and God be with you 
MALLAM MOHAMMED ABACHA

messages.body:
Mallam,
What is your pet name? "Imam".

Since you said that someone may have gotten access to Mustapha's email address I thought I'd better take the precaution of verifying that it was you who was writing me. 

I'm a little unclear on why we need a lawyer involved in this. I have never had a good experience with any of those bottom-feeders, anywhere. It was my understanding that you have a friend in the diplomatic service who's going to bring the consignment here to Latvia and give it to me for safe-keeping. Why the lawyer? And if he's going to be here by tomorrow I don't see that we have the time for all the formalities of hiring one. I can get one of the law firms that we use here in Latvia to take care of the agreement if it's absolutely necessary.

Mallam, do you thnk it would be possible to have Zainab write to me? I've seen her picture - such a beautiful name for such a beautiful woman. I would really like to get to know her better. Please pass on my email address and phone number to her.

I know your diplomat is arriving tomorrow, please send me his name and flight schedule today and I'll head over to the capitol Minsk to meet him. I have to run over there on business tomorrow anyway and can kill two birds with one stone. I've already arranged a room for him here at the hotel in Novosibirsk. Do you know how long he will be staying? I'd be happy to show him around while he's here.

Or better yet - I've sort of been dating a girl who works here at the hotel, Olga, the East German massage therapist. She has a younger sister, Oxnard, who happens to be available and I'm sure she would love to take care of him while he's here. I guess I should ask first - he doesn't have any kind of heart condition or anything like that, does he?

Let me know today.

Lewd

Monday, May 23, 2005

Dear Lewis,

What is your pet name? "Imam".

I was very happy and I feel more comfortable when you rejected my mail.

I understood your mail very well.I actually trust you and that was why my mum made this proposal to you.But in a business that involve such an amount of money you do not have to trust anyone whole heartedly.Likewise, I want the lawyer to involve so that in the case of any breach of contract from any one of us, we can institute a legal action against him.I have to take all precautions to avoid mishappening to my fund.
In the past during the lifetime of my father, my father's leutenant took away $92million after he has arrive Switzerland just awaiting my father's arrival to join him.Therefore, I am very careful to avoid such as this is the only fund we have left in my family.

But I have make sure that neither the diplomat nor the lawyer are aware of the content of the consignment.I only told them it contains African art treasures worth $30million.Please you have to contact the lawyer immediately so that the signing of the agreement can takeplace by noon tomorrow before the departure of the diplomat.The lawyer will represent you in the signing of the agreement.The lawyer will ask you for a fee, you have to settle him so that we can proceed immediately.
The diplomat's name is Mr Patrick Williams, I will send you all the information as soon as he is set to leave for your country.

Lewis, it seem you are falling in love with my sister Zainab, she is a sturbborn girl and my favourite in the family. However, I know she will not agree to write you first, I will tell her about you then give you her mail address.

This has to be confidential until the diplomat arrive your country.

Please get back to me immediately you contact the lawyer.

THANKS
MALLAM MOHAMMED

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,

What the hell is going on?? You had not sent me the diplomat's name and flight number so when I went to Minsk yesterday I had my Administrative Assistant Ms. Bushburn wait at the airport checking every flight coming in from anyplace near Africa. Where is this diplomat?? You assured me he would be here Tuesday.

I look like an idiot now. I had reserved him a room at the hotel in Novosibirsk, which is not an easy thing to do at peak season. The hotel did me a favor and bumped a reservation as a favor to me. The guy they bumped had reserved the room for 2 weeks. Now the hotel is charging me for his room, and it's empty, not to mention that I have one highly pissed off Administrative Assistant. 

Now I find your email that didn't arrive until after I had left for Minsk, saying that he hasn't even left yet! Why did you tell me he was coming on Tuesday?

Mallam Mohammed, my friend, this is no way to conduct business.

Lewd

Mallam Mohammed,
What is your pet's name? "Imam".

A couple of problems here. I haven't seen this agreement and I don't usually make it a practice to sign documents I haven't seen or authorize others to sign for me. Once I've read it, assuming I don't have a problem with it, I'll be happy to sign it. 

But I don't understand why we're going through all of this. Just send the agreement with the diplomat, I'll sign it here, and then he can take it back with him. We have notaries here in Latvia too.

Thanks for Zainab's email address. Not to worry, I won't rush her at all. I just would like to start getting to know her.

Let me know the diplomat's new arrival schedule.

Wednesday, May 25, 2005

Dear Partner, 
What is your pet's name? "Imam".

You don't have to be sceptical about the agreement. The agreement will only state that "a consignment worth $30million belonging to you is to be deliver to you by the diplomat and I am the one sending it. 

That's is all, the sharing agreement is between me and you, which is 70:30 as initially stated, and this is confidential. 

The purpose of the agreement is mainly to bind the diplomat on his duty to deliver this consignment to you. In case there is any breach of contract, we can institute a case against him (diplomat).

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,
I suspect that you were told by this barrister that you need this agreement, right? Mallam Mohammed, this is probably your first time to work with a lawyer, but it is not the first time for me. In my business I have to work with them all the time. You have to be very careful around these guys, they'll always tell you you need such-and-such but it's usually just so they can collect a fee or a retainer.

You said in your last mail that, "...agreement will only state that "a consignment worth $30million belonging to you is to be deliver to you by the diplomat and I am the one sending it.", right? Mallam Mohammed, that has no legal value whatsoever and it's completely unnecessary. What you NEED is a signature from me that I RECEIVED the consignment. It would probably be a good idea if you have the diplomat sign something saying he received the consignment from you and will deliver it to me. We don't have to waste any money on a lawyer.

Speaking of wasting money, this room I have for the diplomat is still sitting here empty and costing me almost $350 a day. Let's get this guy here this weekend and get this finished so we can get you and your family, including Zainab, relocated. I know your mother is anxious to come here and I want to expedite this as much as possible.

Please ask Zainab if she received my email and tell her I'm anxiously awaiting a response.

Lewd

messages.body:
Barrister Clark,
I have a couple of small problems here. First of all, I think all we are interested in is for you to sign a document in my behalf. We are not looking at retaining you past that event. As far as any future action against parties in default, I certainly don't foresee the probability of that happening. I think that is a bridge best crossed when we get to it.

Secondly, I'm not sure what my financial position has to do with what you charge. Surely you have a schedule of rates for the various services you perform, regardless of your clients financial position.

Would you please just quote me the rate for you to sign a single document on my behalf.

Thank you.
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Dear Zane,

What a pleasant surprise it is to finally hear from you! You write as beautifully as your picture looks and your name sounds. 

I am so looking forward to you coming here. I'm usually kind of shy about these things but I've been fascinated by you since your mother sent me your photo. And it wasn't even a very clear photo. Would you mind very much sending me another one, maybe one taken a little closer? I would be so grateful.

I would also be so bold as to say that it was your picture that made me decide to stay involved in the transaction with your mother and brothers. I am pretty well off financially and don't really need this money. As a matter of fact I considered backing out because I don't really have a lot of time to spend on it and I don't need more problems at the moment. But your picture changed all that. I don't know what came over me, I just knew I had to meet you. This has never happened to me before.

I hope I haven't frightened you off. Please write back as soon as you can.
Lewd

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,
I contacted the lawyer again and I was trying to work out the terms with him but he isn't cooperating.

He's asking for $10,000, with $5,500 up front, just to sign a goddam piece of paper! Mallam Mohammed, I do not trust this jerkoff as far as I can throw him. He's talking about future action against one of us who defaults on the agreement, all sorts of crap. 

You said the main reason for needing this guy was to protect your interests from the diplomat who's gonna carry the money here, right? You don't need my signature for that. Like I said before, I'll sign that I received it when he gets it here. Otherwise it'll take all month to get this barrister sorted out and I don't think your mother will be too thrilled about that.

Speaking of which, this hotel room is costing me a fortune and it's just sitting there empty! Get that guy on a plane and get him up here, fast! 

I got a nice letter from Zainab and I think she likes me. She sounds like a real sweetheart and I can't wait to meet her in person.

Please, Mallam Mohammed, put that diplomat on a plane and let's get this done. We have dicked around long enough.

Lewd

messages.body:
Barrister Clark,
I'm confused about your response to my request for an invoice. Surely you realize that I don't seek an invoice as proof of payment but rather as proof of amount billed. It is necessary for me to use funds from my partnership to pay your fee and should we be audited before completion of this transaction I would find myself in a considerable predicament without a proper invoice. Upon payment I expect you to provide a proper receipt for amount payed. I have no objection to you sending that with the diplomat.

I have had Ms. Bushburn, my administrative assistant, searching for a WESTERN UNION  but so far she has been unsuccessful. She is continuing her search.

Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Barrister Clark,
This is exactly what I need for my records and audit purposes. However, I wouldn't go selecting the PIF option from the dropdown just yet.

Barrister, I am without clue as to what these charges mean; we only hired you to sign a document in my absence. If I am asked during an audit why I paid $3,000 for a 'Free Fee', how do I explain what that is? Why does anything have to be registered with the police? The police have no involvement in this. An 'Agency Jetty Clearance'? And what the hell is a 'Bill of Uncertainty', unless I am being made to pay money for being uncertain what all this is about. 

Unless you have accidentally sent me someone else's invoice I believe, sir, that you have misunderstood the scope of your involvement here. Please speak with Mr. Abacha and revise this invoice in accordance with his instructions.

Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,
I am distressed to say this but I am of the firm belief that this barrister is trying to hose us. He sent me an invoice, which is supposed to be for signing a piece of paper in my absence, for $10,000 worth of worthless crap that we don't need. 'Free Fee', police registration, court endorsements. Bill of Uncertainty?? What's up with that?? And would somebody please explain to me what an 'Agency Jetty Clearance' is?? And not a word about signing a pieceof paper for us!

Mallam Mohammed, I warned you about this guy, and all of his ilk. The entire profession is riddled with corruption, and the money this guy is trying to charge us is nothing short of vampirism.

Please excuse my shortness but this transaction has cost me a lot of money to date and with no returns forthcoming. That diplomat was supposed to be here two weeks ago and I'm STILL paying for an empty room.

I have to tell you, right now the only thing keeping me involved in this transacton is the prospect of meeting Zainab one day soon. But at this rate she'll be an old woman before I get to see her.

I told Clark to see you and come back to me with the REAL invoice. If you can't set him straight and get him with the program, my strong suggestion would be to hire a different barrister.

Please talk to him and get back to me.

Lewd

messages.subject: HUMANITERIAN SERVICES SIR.
messages.body:
<ahmedabacha@pathfinder.gr>
Wednesday, June 1, 2005

HUMANITERIAN SERVICES SIR. 

Dear Sir, 
I wish to introduce myself to you and the reason for my reaching out to you. I am Mallam Mohammed Abacha, the son of the late military head of state General Sani Abacha who died mysteriously on the 8th of June 1998. Following the death of my father Gen. Sani Abacha,elections were successfully held in the country and a civilian administration was sworn into power with the assistance of the American Government under the leadership of President Clinton.With the advent of the new democratic administration, a decision was taken by the new president of Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo to probe and ultimately prosecute all past military officers and their cohorts that served in very strategic capacities during the tenure of my father.And I was among those singled out to be punished after a makeshift trial,for the supposed deeds of my dad,ever since I have been in detention for the past 3 years.On monday the 24 September 2002,I was eased,on the condition that I will release the rest of my fathers money in my care,to the tune of $I.5b,which i agreed.Now I have been released but kept under severe house arrest,I had some huge sum of money running into hundreds of millions of dollars stashed in various private foreign accounts around the world,most of wish have been frozen. 

Presently, I am confined under house arrest after my recent release from detention and constrained into seeking for this assistance today because I cannot afford to let this government know that I still have some funds stashed away.Shortly, before my detention I hurriedly deposited the sum of USD35.5 million with a security firm oversea's for safe keeping,registered as ALLUVIAL GOLD DUST hence my seeking your assistance to receive this fund is clear and fair, in good faith and confidence.I have since had this amount deposited into a private security company in Europe.I hereby seek your assistance in travelling and securing this fund out from the security company oversea's and lodging it into your designated bank account in your country. I will adequately compensate you with 15% of the total sum for your assistance and co-operation with me to move this fund to your account for safe keeping where I can easily utilise it.The present administration has beamed their search light on any body remotely related to me and my family and you strongly know for certain that I am under surveillance and I can not operate any of my bank accounts any more, due to their being frozen. I intend to safe guard and invest this amount of money abroad with a reliable foreign business partner so that we can invest the funds in doing business in your country. That is why I am soliciting your assistance and cooperation as regards this business.After arrangements are concluded with you, you will only go to the security company with all the vital documents as proofs to claim this fund out for me for self-keeping.I cannot tell the full story of my predicament on this letter. Please note that I have a relocation plans for me and my family immediately you have cleared out, and deposit into in your account.Please indicate your willingness to assist me by sending to me the following informations:- 

1.Your full name and address,your private phone and fax numbers,international passport photograph for identification so that I can know WHOM that I amc onfiding this fund at his care for security reason's and for us to commence this transaction in good faith and confidence.All the vital paper's covering this deposited cash fund declares it as personal effect which I will only do change the ownership with your name as the depositor just to avoid any eyebrow along the line while this tranaction progresses. 

I am waiting to hear from you very soon. 

Best regards, 
Mallam Mohammed Abacha

Dear Sir,
I wish to introduce myself to you and the reason for my reaching out to you. I am Mallam Mohammed Abacha, the son of the late military head of state General Sani Abacha who died mysteriously on the 8th of June 1998. Following the death of my father Gen. Sani Abacha,elections were successfully held in the country and a civilian administration was sworn into power with the assistance of the American Government under the leadership of President Clinton.With the advent of the new democratic administration, a decision was taken by the new president of Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo to probe and ultimately prosecute all past military officers and their cohorts that served in very strategic capacities during the tenure of my father.And I was among those singled out to be punished after a makeshift trial,for the supposed deeds of my dad,ever since I have been in detention for the past 3 years.On monday the 24 September 2002,I was eased,on the condition that I will release the rest of my fathers money in my care,to the tune of $I.5b,which i agreed.Now I have been released but kept under severe house arrest,I had some huge sum of money running into hundreds of millions of dollars stashed in various private foreign accounts around the world,most of wish have been frozen.

Presently, I am confined under house arrest after my recent release from detention and constrained into seeking for this assistance today because I cannot afford to let this government know that I still have some funds stashed away.Shortly, before my detention I hurriedly deposited the sum of USD35.5 million with a security firm oversea's for safe keeping,registered as ALLUVIAL GOLD DUST hence my seeking your assistance to receive this fund is clear and fair, in good faith and confidence.I have since had this amount deposited into a private security company in Europe.I hereby seek your assistance in travelling and securing this fund out from the security company oversea's and lodging it into your designated bank account in your country. I will adequately compensate you with 15% of the total sum for your assistance and co-operation with me to move this fund to your account for safe keeping where I can easily utilise it.The present administration has beamed their search light on any body remotely related to me and my family and you strongly know for certain that I am under surveillance and I can not operate any of my bank accounts any more, due to their being frozen. I intend to safe guard and invest this amount of money abroad with a reliable foreign business partner so that we can invest the funds in doing business in your country. That is why I am soliciting your assistance and cooperation as regards this business.After arrangements are concluded with you, you will only go to the security company with all the vital documents as proofs to claim this fund out for me for self-keeping.I cannot tell the full story of my predicament on this letter. Dear Zane,
I'm confused and worried. I just got an email from Mallam Mohammed saying he's under close house arrest. Have you heard anything about this? What's going on? I sent him a note back asking him what happened but now I'm thinking I shouldn't have. I don't know if they are able to monitor his email or not.

Zane, I know that you're very busy with your exams and I hate to bother you but I think working through you is the only safe way for now. Help me on this, baby, please. If we don't get this money moved it will be almost impossible for you and your family to come here. I will confess to you that your coming here is the main reason for me helping your mother and brother. The face in your picture haunts me every second of the day and I'm having trouble sleeping thinking about it.

See if you can discreetly contact someone who knows your brother and see if you can find out what happened. Then get back to me and let me know. And I'll try and get a picture of me to you tomorrow.

I'm waiting for your email.
Yours,
Lewd

messages.body:
Friday, June 3, 2005

Dear Lewis,  

I got your mail.I really appreciate your effort so far in assisting my family. I was upset when I got your complain about the lawyer, in fact it is taking too long, and am not happy with that.I envisage that by this date I should have be in Latvia myself for the sharing/possible investment with you.   

Am short of words.The Lawyer copied me the mail he sent to you this afternoon, it was almost the same time I received your mail.   

It has been difficult,for me over here and for you keeping an hotel accommodation for weeks, that's alot of money wasting.   

Mr Lewis, you may not understand this, Lawyers in Nigeria are very expenses mostly when it involve a valuable asset or items.   

Please Lewis, I beg you in the name of God, I don't want us to delay further, I want you to pay the Lawyer so that the diplomat can leave for Latvia latest by sunday, it should not exceed that date.   

Mummy is really worried about this and worried too.Am concern about the consignment getting to you, the money to be paid is insignificant to the total amount of cash involve ($30million).   

Whatever you must have spent in this transaction shall be pay back to you.The amount involve is large, about $30million. Am sure the Lawyer is capitalising on this amount to charge us.Nevermind, just try and send the cash to him so that the diplomat can leave for Latvia on sunday.   

Whatever diplomatic immune (wether police stamp,custom duties, court registration or otherwise) that can be make possible to cover the consignment will be appreciated by me.This will secure the consignment from being open by anybody or security personnel until it gets to you in Latvia.   

Lewis, when my dad was alife, he was paying the lawyer big money on transactions like this, so he is taking this as a point of reference to charge us forgetting that my father is LATE and the family is brooke.   

Please do not bother about the amount you might have spent or about to spend.Just pay the Lawyer, as soon as you receive the consignment you can open it and refund yourself.   

I will greatly appreciate if you can follow my suggestion that the Lawyer can be paid.   

Thanks and God bless you my brother.  
MM

messages.body:
Dearest Zane, 
I am now convinced that something is definitely wrong with Mallam Mohammed. I received a note from him today and, as with yesterday's email from him, it was without his security code. Zane, he ALWAYS uses his security code. I have no idea who sent it.  

Zane, I feel I can confide in you. I can tell by your picture and your words that you don't have a deceptive bone in your body and I know I can trust you. I know this is an inconvenient time for you but your involvement in what Mallam Mohammed and I are doing is absolutely crucial. The fact that you are working on your MBA also instills my confidence that, while you may not have a lot of business experience, you certainly have the knowledge.  

My suspicion is that this Barrister Clark we have been using is behind Mallam Mohammed's house arrest. He's been trying to screw us on this deal from day one and I think he's trying to set this up so that he ends up with the money we are trying to move here.  

I have given this considerable thought and here's what we need to do. DO NOT try to contact your brother! I don't know if his phone has been compromised but it certainly looks as though his email has. I am not going to respond to any more of his email and I will work directly through you.  

Also DO NOT contact Barrister Clark! If you know a second or third-year law student we can use for advice, I think that will be sufficient. We'll pay him a couple hundred bucks for his time.  

My Administrative Assistant Ms. Bushburn has located a WESTERN UNION  in the capitol Minsk. She is going there this afternoon to see her boyfriend and while she is there she will send you $2,000 for expenses. I don't mind doing it and it's certainly cheaper than that bandit barrister. I will have her send it as follows:  

Name of Receiver: Zainab Abacha 
Address: Abacha's Villa, #26 
Abubakar Rimi Way, Off Mnamdi Road 
Kano, Kano State 
Text Question: Are You Beautiful? 
Answer: Yes, Very! 
Name of Sender: Wanda Bushburn 
Country: Latvia  

Your mother had given me her address when she first contacted me and your brother said you are staying with her, so there should be no problem with this reaching you. I've never used WESTERN UNION  before but I believe that there is some kind of number they give you when you send money. When Ms. Bushburn returns on Monday I will send it to you.
  
Once you and I have managed to get that diplomat here with the money we will begin making arrangement to bring you and your family here. I've never been involved in anything like this before and I'm in uncharted waters here. Please keep everything we're doing very confidential.  

One last thing - for purposes of security I am going to abandon my hotmail account and this will be my last correspondence to you from hotmail.  My new email address as of this moment is xxxxxxx@xxxx.xxx. Tell NO ONE ELSE about it, not even Mallam Mohammed, and send all your correspondence there.  

Write back to me soon. 
Yours always, 
Lewd

Hi,  
As I have earlier told you do not respond to any of my brother's mail without the code.My mummy mail address is mariamaba3@kaixo.com.

so, what's happening?

"Take care friend" 
Bye-Zane

Mallam Mohammed, I am confused. Last week the diplomat had not yet left Nigeria and you were telling me to keep the room for him. Now you're telling me he's ALREADY in Holland with the money?? When did this happen?? And a note I received this morning from your sister Zainab said that she's flying over to Lagos to meet with you and the diplomat and Barrister Clark. How can she do that if the diplomat is in Holland? And I thought we had gotten rid of that dimwitted barrister!

And why is it any less expensive for him to take it to Holland than to bring it here? I thought I understood everything that was going on with this transaction but now I don't understand anything!

Look, please don't take this as a sign of misstrust but I need to check this with your mother. She told me that I should contact her immediately if there were any problems and to me confusion in a deal of this magnitude is a problem. I'll keep you informed on what she tells me.

I'll get back to you.

messages.body:
Hi Friend, 
How is work today? I hope all is fine.How are you? "my sweetest one zero one zane" 

My trip to Lagos was very successful and promising. 

Thank you for the $2,000, i really appreciate, i told my mum about it. I will get it tomorrow. I just got back to kano,and it was a very successful trip. I met my brother and i told him everything, he was even surprise to hear about the story as i narrates to him. 

It 'll interest u to know that, I was able to meet the Barrister, I also went to the office of  the diplomat but i coudn't see him as a result of his meeting with the new ministerial 
appointees. 

When i met with the lawyer in company of my brother, i requested to see the invoice, he showed me a copy of the invoice.I immediately argue that his charges were too high for the transaction.I pleaded with him to reduce the charges.After much negotiation, he finally agreed on a term that he will reduce the fee with $3,000 on the condition that the total money must be paid on one installment. I finally agreed with his terms. 

You see Lewis, consultations with lawyers in Nigeria is very expensive especially when it  involves a Senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN). In a population of over 120million, there are only 135 SAN members.That gives them a high  level of monopoly in the legal profession. As you have suggested to involve a 300 or 400 level law student was a good suggestion, but the fact is that there is high risk when too many people are involve in such confidential  business.

My family is very popular, every press man or woman is looking out for us to have a chat with in their various magazines and newspapers.Considering this i think we should pay the lawyer so that we can have confidentiality until you receive the goods. The $2,000 u sent to me is still very save, please whatever you can raise let me know so that i can discuss with my mum, maybe we can get loan from one or two friends to add to the amount you may send down to complete the total money. 

The diplomat called me this evening, we have discussed, he has agreed that he will leave for your country tomorrow evening, he will spend 2night with you and later proceed to London to attend a conference on behalf of the Presidency. Therefore, i will make arrangement to get a loan of $5,000 in addition with the $2,000 u sent to me to settle the Barrister tomorrow when I arrive Lagos. 

Please Baby, get back to me immediately so we can forge ahead. 

Lewis, if this my arrangement is ok by you, there's something else i want to suggest, i do not want you to send the money directly to the Lawyer,I have collected his payment details and is below, but the WESTERN UNION  details shall be sent to me on my mail box. Zane, my love, I am getting so confused here. All these different security codes, first the diplomat is coming here, then he's not coming here, then the money is in Amsterdam, now he's going to London and I have to meet him there. What next? He's taking the consignment to Mars and I have to go there to get it?

Zane, Ms. Bushburn sent you the money through WESTERN UNION  under the name Zainab Abacha. She is very efficient and I have no idea why you can't receive it unless there has been a screw-up at Western Union. The next time one of us can get over to Minsk we'll try to figure out what happened and get it sorted out. 

I kind of resent the implication that I would be playing games with you. I am quite serious about wanting to get this finished and get you here. Please don't talk about games anymore.

It will be very difficult for me to get away from here with this sasquatch infestation that we are experiencing. Can't the diplomat swing by Latvia on his way home and deliver it to me? This is driving me nuts!

Lewd

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,

I have to inform you that I have an emergency here that I must deal with and will be out of touch for an indefinite period of time. We've had an encounter between one of those damned sasquatch and a hotel guest and the guest came off the worst. I'm sure there's going to be legal action against the hotel if we don't get out and hunt these things down.

I leave this morning with two of the groundskeepers to find these varmints and get rid of them once and for all. I don't want a delay in the transaction so I have forwarded your and Zainab's address to a close friend and associate of mine. I have asked him to work with you to bring this deal to a successful conclusion.

A little background - his name is Mikhail Stroganov and he runs a very successful publishing company. He is probably the wealthiest person I know and he knows how to get things done quickly. I did not have time to bring him completely up to speed on where we are but I did receive an email from him agreeing to assist. I will reimburse him myself so you dodn't have to be concerned about that. From the small part that I explained to him he is very enthusiastic about this. I mailed him my power of attorney, which he should have in the next day or two, and complete authorization to act in my behalf. He will be contacting you shortly.

Well, I'm off, wish me luck. If I get back anywhere near the hotel I'll check in with you. And once we get these critters, you and your family are invited for the celebration bar-b-que!

My love to Zane!

Lewd

Dearest Zainab,

I'm in my office again briefly, just stopping in again to pick up more provisions and then back out in the forest. We're leaving in about an hour and I just wanted to get a fast note off to you so you don't forget me.

I had asked Ms. Bushburn to go back to Minsk and straighten out the problem with WESTERN UNION . She went back to see her boyfriend last wek but unfortunately she has not returned yet. This is not the first time she's taken off like this and I'd fire her ass if she wasn't so attractive (not as attractive as you, though). I just hope she got it sorted out but please send me a note if she didn't.

There's a pile of email from Mikhail and it looks like he's still in close touch with Mallam Mohammed. I haven't had time to go through it but by now this deal should be pretty well completed. I told you Mikhail would be a good guy to work with. Have you and your family started making arrangements to travel here?

Ok, gotta split. Give my regards to Mallam Mohammed and Mustapha. By the way, I keep a copy of our picture with me to keep me company on those cold, lonely nights in the forest. I can't wait to get my hands on the real thing!!

Still thinking of you,
Lewd

messages.body:
Mikhail, 

It was fortunate that you caught me as I was leaving. 

I can only say that you don't know Zainab like I do. She was extremely helpful to me before you arrived to lend a hand and while I can't help but feel the way I do about her, I think that in no way has my vision been clouded in the least. I should also point out that while she may not have a lot of practical experience in these matters, she certainly does have the education. She has just completed her MBA there in Kano. 

And while I admit you were correct about that Russian Jezebel that time back in Moscow, this is a different situation entirely. Zainab does not have a dishonest bone in her beautiful body and is as anxious as we are to see this transaction to completion. Deep down in your heart I know you want to see her get what she has coming as much as I do. If you feel that the lawyer is a useless jerkoff (and you know how I feel about lawyers), just tell Mallam Mohammed and I'm sure he'll get a different one. I trust your capable judgement in these things. 

I haven't had time to go through all of your email. I just stopped in to pick up a few cans of spam and a few more litres of vodka. We're having an awful time finding this critter and every attempt to get him in our sights has ended in frustration. We've used up more ammunition than the krauts expended at Stalingrad but in every case it's been some sort of dometic creature that we've dispatched and not our sasquatch. 

Keep up the good work I know you're doing and keep the custard in it's usual plasma-like state.
 
Lewd

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail, 

Thank you very much for taking your time to resolve this issue accordingly. Now I understand better the good role you have played to make this transaction work out for both parties. 

Once again I really appreciate your effort to get rid of the impostor, it was Mr Noogie's fault, I told him the intricacies involve but he failed to follow my instructions properly. Well, thank you so much and thank God we are back on the right track. There is no need to blame each other. 

In the issue of Zainab, she was not initially involve in the transaction, herself and Mr Noogie were just friends. It was in the event when the impostor came into the transaction that Lewis personally invited Zainab to handle the transaction since he was a bit confuse on who to trust, whether the impostor or Myself. Zainab is my kid sister, she is my favorite in the family, but her only problem is that she is a "no nonsense lady" Please whatever she must have said to you, kindly forgives and forgets. One thing that will interest you about her is that she is very intelligent and friendly. I hope when we come over to Latvia you will meet her and find out all that. 

Mikhail, the Lawyer has taken that instruction when Mr Noogie introduces Zainab into the transaction because she was the only person he trusts then. 

I will talk to Zainab immediately, and tomorrow I will be in the Lawyer's office to talk to him on the transaction. I have initially asked the diplomat to deposit the consignment in a security company in London. Though the company has a branch office in Nigeria. 

What I am going to suggest now is: - 

1.We shall make a change of ownership of the consignment so it will bear the name of Mr Noogie. 

2. After the change of ownership, Mr Noogie has to travel to London to collect the consignment up or make arrangement with the security company on how the consignment shall be deliver to him in Latvia. 

Mikhail, if my suggestions are ok, let me know so that I will immediately contact my mummy for approval then I contact the security company immediately for the change of ownership. I will scan to you the deposit certificate of the consignment tomorrow. 

We have to do this fast because we have delayed already. 

Mikhail my friend, are you a Muslim? Your name sound like a Muslim name. Please reply me immediately. Please kindly forget the differences we have exhibited towards each other. The Barrister and Zainab is your friend. I will talk to them immediately to join their hands on the deck. 

Thank you very much and God bless you abundantly. 

It's me your friend, 
MALLAM MOHAMMED ABACHA

Hi, 

I don't understand what you are talking about.I want you to get one thing very clear, I don't need your money or any other person's money.My family is wealthy. The only problem we are facing is all our accounts in the country are frozen and that doesn't make us beggars. I wonder if this is the way you do your business. 

Ever since you are into this transaction, everything is stuck, there is no progress.Is this how you want to achieve your aim? It is the problem of yours that you have to deal with another man (an impostor) who called himself my brother (ABACHA). There is one thing you have to digest into you; it is either you are sincerely into this business or you back out of it. 

From your first mail you sent to me, it is glaring we are not compactable, I don't like you cos you do not have respect for women. If you continue this way, i will suggest you stop sending me mail. 

bye

messages.body:
Zainab, my love,

We're searching an area of the forest that is closer to the hotel so I had a chance to stop in and quickly send you a note. I have so many things that I want to talk to you about but just don't have the time now.

There is a whole passel of email that Mikhail has forwarded to me so things must be moving along pretty well. Mikhail is a great guy to work with, isn't he? I knew that you and your brother would like him once you got to know him. I don't have time to read his email but I always feel confident when he's helping me with something.

Zainab, I've had a lot time to think during those cold, lonely nights out in the forrest. Why don't you come to Latvia now? You don't need to be there while Mikhail and Mallam Mohammed are taking care of this business. Please, come now!

Still no sign of Ms. Bushburn so I presume she's still in Minsk with her boyfriend. I'm gonna have to jerk a knot in her tail the next time I see her. When I'm finished with the hunt the first thing I will do is find out what went wrong at WESTERN UNION . I'm sure that Mikhail has the transaction well-covered financially, but I want you to have that $2,000 anyhow as a gift. You can spend it on whatever you like.

Ok, I'm outta here again. All my love to you, and say hi to Mallam Mohammed and Mikhail for me.

Yours always,
Lewd

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail, 
How are you today? And I hope you are hearing from my friend Lewis. Please am sorry for the way Zainab must have addressed you.I have spoken with her, I will make her apologise to you ok. 

Goodnews!!! 
I spoke with my mummy about the change of ownership to Lewis, she was really afraid but I have to convinced her about the whole plan but thank God after much persuasion She finally gave her approval. I have to re-assure are that the transaction is in safe hands.Please Mikhail you will help me to retain the trust my mummy has for me and guarantee that the consignment is safe in your hand. 

I immediately went to the security company to enquire the cost of making the change of ownership.The company legal director who is incharge gave me a total bill of 2,450 pounds including his legal fee (1,700pounds) 1700+ 750(change of ownership fee) = 2,450. I think this is rather too high, alternatively we have the option of bringing our lawyer or another lawyer, may be we can pay him about few hundrend bucks and settle for the change of ownership fee of 750pounds only with the company. Tomorrow I will go about to make arrangement for the lawyer. 

Mikhail, can we still involve Barrister Clark? Well, whatever you may suggest, my concern is to make the cost lesser. 

Please get back to me immediately. 

ATTACHED IS THE CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT. 
THANKS

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail, 

At the time I replied your mail this morning, I was hasting to see Barrister Clark. I was actually thinking if we could contract another Lawyer.Since you have suggested that we still use Barrister Clark, I agreed with you.I have confidence in Barrister Clark because he is a Senior Advocate of Nigeria. Though I was considering that he is going to cost us as a result of his statute in the profession. 

I have discussed with him, he agreed to undertake the "change of ownership" process. But he is charging 1,100pounds.Well,I considered this, though it's high but still better than involving the security company's Legal director. Therefore, the total money the "change of ownership" is going to cost us is 1,850pounds. The lawyer also went further to state that the change of ownership is going to be backed by "POWER OF ATTORNEY" so he is going to issue this to you as this will empower Mr Lewis as the owner of the transaction. 

I think this arrangement by him is fairly ok, Please if this is ok by you just let me know so that I will ask him to start the process. 

The question you asked; yes I love football but am not a good player. I will appreciate if you can get me a phone number I can call you. 

Thanks 
MM

Dear Mr Stroganov,

Sir Charles Farnes-Barnes has asked me to contact you on an urgent matter. As per your instructions, we sold your holdings in Chavster Newman Media this morning and you now have 690,000 Canadian dollars in your Smegaroon account.

As per your instrictions wer have converted 250,000 Canadian dollars into Slovenian golden dorks and Sir Charles suggests that you use either of these currencies to pay Mr Mohammad should you decide to continue with this business. 

Sir Charles adds that you must obtain an assurance from Mr Mohammad that all the modalities are in place and that the transaction will be conducted in fragrente delicto. Furthmore Sir Charles sees no reason why this should create any problem but as a matter of form these assurances should be given by Mr Mohammad.

Yours sincerely,
Mrs Hettie Meshuganah

I REGRET FOR MY LATE RESPONSE TO YOUR MAIL.

SIR, ALL ARRANGEMENT HAS BEEN MADE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE MODALITIES INVOLVE. 

THE CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE SHALL BE ISSUE BY THE SECURITY COMPANY WERE THE CONSIGNMENT IS DEPOSITED. THIS SHALL BE WITNESSED BY A LAWYER AND SIGNED BY THE COMPANY'S LEGAL REPRESENTATIVE.

THE CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP PROCESS WILL TAKE ABOUT 2 OR 3DAYS WITHIN THE COMPANY AS A RESULT OF THE MODALITIES INVOLVE. 

SIR, I AM ASSURING YOU THAT WHOLE PROCESS SHALL BE CONCLUDED LATEST ON FRIDAY OR SATURDAY THIS WEEK. 

YOURS OBEDIENT, 
BARRISTER RASHEED RAFIDANDI CLARK

messages.body:
Zane, my dearest, I'm back!

Oh, the stories I have to tell you when we're together! It was a terrible ordeal, but we were finally able to dispatch that nasty creature. Most of him is now safely stored in the hotel freezer while his pelt graces the hotel lobby. They weren't able to entirely get rid of the smell but it's not too bad if you stand about 10 feet away from it.

Ivan, the hotel cook, says that he has a marinade recipe for cougar that he thinks will work just fine with sasquatch. I promised you a bar-b-que, remember?

I read an email that Mikhail forwarded to me from Barrister Clark saying that the transaction would be complete by Friday. Well, it's Sunday now, so I presume everything is finished and you're making travel arrangements. Please, Punkin, write back now and tell me when you'll be here!

Zane, I had a lot of time to think out there in the woods. I thought about the wonderful life we could have together if this money were just for you and me. What if I told you there might be a way for just the two of us to have this money? We could still send your family enough to live on from the interest. What would you think about this? I would still have to pay off Mikhail for his time - there are rumors that he used to work for the KGB and he probably still has friends that I wouldn't want to come looking for me, but I don't think we'd have to worry about your brothers or mother finding us. I'm not asking for an answer this moment, just think about it.

I am exhausted and I smell worse than that sasquatch. It's a shower and to bed. When I wake up in the morning I'll get an email off to Mikhail and Mohammed to see how things have concluded.

All my love,
Lewd

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,

I arrived back at the hotel yesterday after a long and arduous hunt, fully expecting this thing to be wrapped up. I have spent the morning reading several emails from Mikhail and I have to say I'm somewhat distressed to find that we haven't made any real progress.
Before I write to Mikhail I wanted to get your side of the story first. From what I can tell, the main bottleneck here seems to be our infamous Barrister Clark. I'm sure you will recall that I was not overly impressed with his performance either and Mikhail seems to be even less so. I don't know, maybe it is because he is too busy with other endeavors to fully focus on our transaction but he seemed to me to be unresponsive and somewhat diffused. I believe I suggested it once before but what do you now think about maybe replacing him?

Mohammed, I would like you to ask your mother to contact me. I have sent her several emails but none of them have been responded to. She told me that if there were ever any problems during the course of the transaction to contact her, and I would at least like to bring her up to date on where we are.

Please get back to me as soon as possible. I'm sure you are aware that your sister and I have developed a relationship, hopefully with your approval, and I want to get her to Latvia as quickly as possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you.
Lewd

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail, 

I was expecting your call; I had wanted us to have a discussion on phone. I must not hesitate to tell you that I am not impress with the way you have handled the transaction so far.We have not achieved anything so far, so good. 

I wonder why you have been so curious about the Lawyer. I am the owner of this business. The lawyer will only assist us in perfecting the legal procedures on the change of ownership. We are not employing him for retainership. He only needs to sign a document, which may take a day or two. 

Mikhail, I want to make it very clear to you that I am getting impatient concerning this whole transaction. My account is being credited every day with the sum of $345 per day for the extra days spend by the consignment in the security company. If you are truly interested in this transaction, you have to make the payment or I have to look for another person who will be interested, besides all your expenses shall be paid to you before the sharing or you can open the consignment immediately you receive it to settle your expenses. 

I want you to make your position known to me in your next mail so that I move forward. 

ThanksMALLAM MOHAMMED 

NOTE LEWIS: 
I WILL FORWARD TO YOU OUR RECENT COMMUNICATION.

messages.body:
Dear Lewis,

What's your pet name? IMAM
How are you? "my sweetest one zero one zane"

It is really nice to hear from you. And am happy that you are back.
Hope all is well for now in regard to the critters?

Lewis, dealing with Mr. Mikhail has been very hectic and depressing. I have tried has much as possible to control my temper because I respect you as a worthy person and for the fact that you are out to assist my family despite your share of the transaction.
There comes a time that he insulted Zainab and she as to reciprocate. I have to personally settle them both and I made Zainab to apologized to him, which she did.
I briefed him on the transaction so far, he wanted us to start all over again, he insisted but I then suggested that we made a change of ownership of the transaction in your name "Mr Lewis Noogie".

In the process we need to involve a lawyer. The legal director of the security company gave us a bill of about 3,000pounds, but with the option that we could arrange to bring our lawyer inn. I told Mikhail, he suggested that we should give barrister Clark a second chance, which I agreed upon.

I forwarded to Mr Mikhail the certificate of deposit.

Now, the payment for the change of ownership in the company is 750pounds and the Lawyer fee and other legal expenses amounted 1,100pounds; all together amounted to 1,850pounds which is lesser than the cost we would have incurred if we decide to involve the company legal director.A certain financial adviser advised him to pay the money in a certain currency, but I refused because WESTERN UNION  in Nigeria pay with British pounds and USA dollars.

He sent a mail to Barrister Clark that was rather insulting, Clark refuses to reply. He insisted that barrister Clark should explain to him the process of the change of ownership.

I have to go to Barrister Clark's office here in Lagos to make him see reasons with the nature of the transaction. And Clark sends him a mail that same day.

And Clark told him that he has to prepare the power of Attorney that will empower you as the owner of the transaction. And this is to guarantee or back up the change of ownership certificate.

Lewis, am not happy to tell you this; that Mikhail broke the rule of the transaction by informing Clark that the consignment contain real fund. I was upset; I never wanted anyone except you to know that. Barrister Clark called me to find out but I insisted that the consignment contains Africa Art worth $30million.

In summary, there has been no success in the transaction, Zainab got fed up and she left for Kano.

Lewis, the only thing that is holding the transaction is the payment of the 1,850pounds.
My mummy is worried, you should reach her via: mariamaba3@kaixo.com  I will inform her to get your mail by tomorrow. Please do not make the same mistake of sending a mail to an impostor or a wrong person. Take note of my mums email address.

I just sent Mikhail the following mail before your mail arrives.

messages.body:
Mallam Mohammed,

I received the transcript of your correspondence with Mikhail and I will go through it this morning to see if I can't come up with a way to work ourselves out of this mess. I am very disappointed that this thing isn't complete and settled.

I realize that Mikhail can be very demanding but he is very detail-oriented. He has profited immensely from some deals that I considered at the time to be very shaky but he was able to do so because he makes sure that all the i's are dotted and the t's crossed. One thing I don't understand is why you didn't just go ahead and pay the barrister. If you're paying $345/day for the consignment to sit in that security company, paying the 1,800 pounds is the equivalent of a week's storage time. Seems to me it would have just been simpler to pay the guy and get it done and over with.

I'll go through the correspondence and get back to you.

Lewd

messages.body:
Mariam, dear lady,
I thought it would be a good time to touch base with you.

I just returned from a terrible ordeal in the Latvian countryside, but that's a story I can tell you when you get here. Right now I think we should discuss the transaction. I would like this discussion to remain strictly between you and myself. Mariam, this thing, to put it gently, is completely dicked up, and from what I can tell from the correspondence that Mallam Mohammed has sent to me, it appears to be mostly the fault of him and that idiot barrister Clark.

Mariam, this transaction should have been so simple. When I started this with Mustafa, the consignment was going to be carried here by diplomat. Very neat and clean. Then Mallam Mohammed gets involved and all of a sudden there's this shyster lawyer lurking over everybody like a vulture, asking for exorbitant fees just to sign a piece of paper for me, being unresponsive, and obviously clueless as to what is going on. Then when the diplomat has to go to London or Amsterdam or someplace on some junket, instead of just sitting on the consignment for awhile until the diplomat return, he sends it WITH the diplomat to be deposited in some "security" company, whatever the hell that is.

It was necessary for me to nominate a representative, Mr. Mikhail Stroganov, to work in my behalf, Mikhail is a very successful businessman and has considerable financial resources and personnel at his disposal. He immediately picked up on the fact that this Barrister Clark is a total incompetent and didn't hesitate a moment to say so.

I am sorry that Mikhail and Zainab got off to a bad start but it seems that things have been smoothed over between them. I presume that Zane has told you about our relationship. I look forward so much to her finally being here with me. As a matter of fact, I see that she has sent me a letter which I will read as soon as I finish this.

Mariam, we have to do something to get this moving. My own suggestion would be to bring Mustapha back to run this from your end. He seems much more capable in these sorts of things, more direct and to-the-point.

Please get back to me as soon as you can. I have not forgotten that you said you consider me as a son and right now I could use some motherly advice.

Lewd

messages.body:
Zane, my love,
I was at first so happy to get your letter until I read your statement that, "We may spend some time together but not forever ...". You don't realize what you've done to me, Punkin.

I told you long ago that the only reason I was staying involved in this was because of you and the hope of spending the rest of my life with a woman of your beauty and intelligence. And now you tell me it's just for a little while.

You hurt me, darlin'. Real bad.

Is that what I am to you, Zane? A boy-toy? A one-night stand? Were you planning on coming here, using me as some kind of stud, and then throwing me away? Well, Lewd Noogie has been used this way many times before and I vowed it would not happen again.

It's true, I wanted to get the money for just you and me, but is that such a crime? That I should be only concerned for myself and my wife? Yes. There, I've said it. I knew I wanted you from the first time your mother sent me your picture.

I just finished letters to Mallam Mohammed and your mother trying to get this transaction moving but you have sapped my will. I have to rethink all of this, Zane. I'm still very tired from my ordeal and right now I'm very confused by your letter.

I thought it would be so much more.

Yours in the arms of dispair,
Lewd

messages.body:
Hi Baby,

I am sorry if my message has hurt you.That was not what i mean.I only wanted to be straight forward.

What am trying to say in excess is that we have to know each other very well before making up a plan to stay together forever.

You are handsome and charming but there is more to that i need to know. In Nigeria or Africa, we cannot marry like that without the blessing of the immediate and the extended family.All the traditional rites has to be perform before we can decides to stay together forever.

My coming to Latvia is to know you better, if we both decides that we are compactible, you have to come with me to Nigeria to perform the marriage arrangement and agreement with my family.

To be frank and sincere, i need you as much as you need me. 

I was in the immigration office today to put up application for my visa.Mum is going to allow me to come to Latvia with Mohammed.

Never mind baby, i shall make it up to you. 
takecare and stay save.-Zane

messages.body:
Dearest Zane,

I suppose it's my fault. You have to understand that much of my life is spent on the road, going from one hotel to another, and with very little companionship. The only contact with a woman that I've had in a long time is with Olga, the East German massage therapist that works here at the hotel in Novosibirsk. She and I were starting to get serious until you came along and I have more or less burned my bridges with her since I got to know you.

Zane, I know you're right when you say we need time to find out if we're really compactible. It's just a lingering fear that I have of finding out that we're not. I guess we just need to give it time.

Lewd

if we are going to get married we 've to know each other very well. To avoid a situation of getting married today and divorce tomorrow. Pls just remain the good guy u're, definitely we are going to have a nice time together in Novosibirsk.

-Zane

messages.body:
My Dear Son,

I am not so opportune to check my mails so often.I have to drop by today to do just this.

I have read your message i agreed with some things you mentioned.
Yes, Zainab has told me so much about you, from the way she talks about you I know she is in love.

It has bothered me so much the way this is being delayed, i do not really need to blame anyone for that.

First of all, you should understand the nature, the complexity and secrecy involve in the transaction.Cos of this it is abruptly difficult and risky to be changing hands of persons already involve.The issue of the Lawyer is not different.He was one of my husband's Lawyer, we have paid him exorbitantly in the past likewise he still expect that from us.Besides involving a senior advocate Lawyer here in Nigeria is as expenses as that.

I will not support the ideal of changing lawyer because of the secrecy of the consignment.

Therefore, all I want you to do is to send money to Mohammed to take care of all the expenses.I have already stated that all shall be paid to you.Your friend and representative has not make any impact in the business so i just relax until when i hear your return.We should also watch out for issue of impostor, Mustapha was not so careful to that extent cos he was always seen in the public places, that attract government spies all over him.Mohammed is more careful and experience in such.Your suggestion to bring Mustapha back on the transaction is rather risky.

The diplomat was only assisting us in moving the consignment out of the country and this was against his official duties,when his change of movement came up which was dictated by the government , we could not compel him to go to Latvia when he have an assignment in London. When you could not meet him up I suggested that the consignment be deposited with a security company.

All I think we should do to perfect the change of ownership is to pay all the fees involve,this will enable you deal with the security company directly as the owner. i will personally make sure that all your expenses is paid back to you before your share of the money.

Zainab went to the immigration office to prepare her visa, sure she will be coming to Latvia together with Mohammed.

Please always get back to me for update.
IT'S ME
Hajia Mariam Abacha
